Uses of Package
io.atomix.cluster.messaging

  • Packages that use io.atomix.cluster.messaging 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.cluster
    Provides classes and interfaces for cluster management.
    io.atomix.cluster.messaging
    Provides high-level interfaces for direct and publish-subscribe inter-cluster communication.
    io.atomix.primitive
    Provides classes and interfaces for defining and managing primitive types.
    io.atomix.primitive.partition
    Provides classes and interfaces for managing primitive partitions, partition groups, and member groups.
  • Classes in io.atomix.cluster.messaging used by io.atomix.cluster 
    Class and Description
    BroadcastService
    Service for broadcast messaging between nodes.
    ClusterCommunicationService
    High-level MemberId based intra-cluster messaging service.
    ClusterEventService
    Publish-subscribe based messaging service.
    MessagingService
    Interface for low level messaging primitives.
  • Classes in io.atomix.cluster.messaging used by io.atomix.cluster.messaging 
    Class and Description
    BroadcastService
    Service for broadcast messaging between nodes.
    ClusterCommunicationService
    High-level MemberId based intra-cluster messaging service.
    ClusterEventService
    Publish-subscribe based messaging service.
    MessagingException
    Top level exception for MessagingService failures.
    MessagingService
    Interface for low level messaging primitives.
    Subscription
    ClusterEventService subscription context.
  • Classes in io.atomix.cluster.messaging used by io.atomix.primitive 
    Class and Description
    ClusterCommunicationService
    High-level MemberId based intra-cluster messaging service.
    ClusterEventService
    Publish-subscribe based messaging service.
  • Classes in io.atomix.cluster.messaging used by io.atomix.primitive.partition 
    Class and Description
    ClusterCommunicationService
    High-level MemberId based intra-cluster messaging service.
